programme.title: Behind The Visor with Nico Hülkenberg
programme.desc: He may have taken 3 years out of full-time F1, but Nico Hülkenberg certainly hasn't lost the motivation to push himself. Earlier in the year, we caught up with the Hulk himself, where Nico opens up on his early retirement the first time around, his comeback with Haas and his future with Audi in F1. He also talks to GP Racing about his life, what drives him and what is really important outside of F1. For this interview, we partnered with our sister team GP Racing Magazine. Check out the link below to read the extended interview with Nico and more exclusive articles! www.gpracing.com

programme.title: Why the 'second' Niki Lauda was even better than the first
programme.desc: As the Formula 1 paddock sets up in Monaco, the late Niki Lauda is not far from anyone's thoughts following his death earlier this week. Inside the paddock, Edd Straw is joined by Giorgio Piola, who knew Lauda throughout his F1 career, to get a very personal account of what it was like to know the three-time world champion. Piola explains what made Lauda tick, and how his accident in 1976 changed him into a new person who was "even more wonderful than the first".

programme.title: 9 interesting F1 tests that didn’t lead to anything
programme.desc: Formula 1 testing has thrown up some interesting car and driver combinations over the years, and as this list shows, plenty of top-name drivers have turned up in unexpected places. But sometimes a test deal catches the eye then doesn’t lead to a more permanent arrangement, for a wide variety of reasons. Here we take a look at nine particularly high-profile drivers who had a brief try-out with a team, but didn’t end up signing a proper deal

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: How NOT to drive around Monaco
programme.desc: Prepare for a Monaco Grand Prix track guide with a difference: As we take you around a full lap on the streets of Monte Carlo, Jake Boxall-Legge stops off at each corner to recall some of the famous incidents to have happened between the walls over the years. It's not just the well-known crashers who get it wrong here - as our guide shows, even the absolute best in F1 history have ended up in Monaco's barriers

programme.title: Gérard Larrousse: Man of many racing talents
programme.desc: Peter Windsor meets Gerard Larrousse, the former rally driver, double Le Mans winner, F1 driver, Renault F1 Team Manager and F1 team owner, in his home in Marseille, France.

programme.title: Round 2: Velocitta - Race 1 (EN)
programme.desc: Watch race 1 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.title: ELMS 2024: Season review
programme.desc: Check out highlights from the 2024 European Le Mans Series.

programme.title: Robert Wickens - The Next Lap - Episode 1
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.title: Pikes Peak - The Mountain Decides
programme.desc: Renowned documentary film maker Jeremy Hart shows us the challenges faced from the Pikes Peak International Hillclimb, one of racing's toughest tests against the clock - featuring the recording-breaking Volkswagen I.D. R Pikes Peak.

programme.title: Thrill of the Race - Season 2: Episode 4 - Borderforce!
programme.desc: Thrill of the Race, episode 4 comes from Knockhill after a complete change in conditions throughout the weekend bringing a big challenge to the teams and riders! Plus the three races gave us three different race winners as now seven contenders have celebrated victory

programme.title: Behind The Visor with Nico Hülkenberg
programme.desc: He may have taken 3 years out of full-time F1, but Nico Hülkenberg certainly hasn't lost the motivation to push himself. Earlier in the year, we caught up with the Hulk himself, where Nico opens up on his early retirement the first time around, his comeback with Haas and his future with Audi in F1. He also talks to GP Racing about his life, what drives him and what is really important outside of F1. For this interview, we partnered with our sister team GP Racing Magazine. Check out the link below to read the extended interview with Nico and more exclusive articles! www.gpracing.com

programme.title: Why the 'second' Niki Lauda was even better than the first
programme.desc: As the Formula 1 paddock sets up in Monaco, the late Niki Lauda is not far from anyone's thoughts following his death earlier this week. Inside the paddock, Edd Straw is joined by Giorgio Piola, who knew Lauda throughout his F1 career, to get a very personal account of what it was like to know the three-time world champion. Piola explains what made Lauda tick, and how his accident in 1976 changed him into a new person who was "even more wonderful than the first".

programme.title: 9 interesting F1 tests that didn’t lead to anything
programme.desc: Formula 1 testing has thrown up some interesting car and driver combinations over the years, and as this list shows, plenty of top-name drivers have turned up in unexpected places. But sometimes a test deal catches the eye then doesn’t lead to a more permanent arrangement, for a wide variety of reasons. Here we take a look at nine particularly high-profile drivers who had a brief try-out with a team, but didn’t end up signing a proper deal

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: How NOT to drive around Monaco
programme.desc: Prepare for a Monaco Grand Prix track guide with a difference: As we take you around a full lap on the streets of Monte Carlo, Jake Boxall-Legge stops off at each corner to recall some of the famous incidents to have happened between the walls over the years. It's not just the well-known crashers who get it wrong here - as our guide shows, even the absolute best in F1 history have ended up in Monaco's barriers

programme.title: Gérard Larrousse: Man of many racing talents
programme.desc: Peter Windsor meets Gerard Larrousse, the former rally driver, double Le Mans winner, F1 driver, Renault F1 Team Manager and F1 team owner, in his home in Marseille, France.

programme.title: Round 2: Velocitta - Race 1 (EN)
programme.desc: Watch race 1 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.title: ELMS 2024: Season review
programme.desc: Check out highlights from the 2024 European Le Mans Series.

programme.title: Robert Wickens - The Next Lap - Episode 1
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.title: Pikes Peak - The Mountain Decides
programme.desc: Renowned documentary film maker Jeremy Hart shows us the challenges faced from the Pikes Peak International Hillclimb, one of racing's toughest tests against the clock - featuring the recording-breaking Volkswagen I.D. R Pikes Peak.

programme.title: Round 2: Velocitta - Race 2 (EN)
programme.desc: Watch race 2 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.title: Regrets, Family and Ducati: A Deep-Dive with MotoGP's Marc Marquez
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, Uri Puigdemont sits down with eight-time World Champion and newest Ducati MotoGP rider, Marc Marquez. In it, Marc talks about his career-defining switch from Honda to Ducati in 2023, the relationship between himself and brother Alex as they both compete for the sport’s greatest prize, how his family are dealing with the fights on-track, and how he’s getting along with new teammate Francesco Bagnaia. There’s also a deep-dive into Marquez’s mentality, from the recent chaos of that aborted start in Austin, the crash that ended his perfect start to 2025, and what Marc would tell his 18 year old self, nearly 15 years after his first World Championship in the 125cc...

programme.title: Giorgio Piola: Illustrating Speed
programme.desc: For nearly 50 years Giorgio Piola has been the foremost technical journalist in Formula 1. He has attended more Grands Prix than anyone in history. This film looks at the remarkable career of this legend.

programme.title: 2025 Hail International Rally - Full Review
programme.desc: All the highlights from the 2025 Hail International Rally in Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: 1000 Lakes Rally 1986
programme.desc: The Italian Lancia and the French Peugeot teams came to the renowned 1000 Lakes Rally hotly disputing the manufacturers' title, with Markku Alen matched against Timo Salonen. Peugeot, however, had another ace in the pack in the shape of 27 year-old rising local star Juha Kankkunen, who was looking extremely good for the drivers' championship. This video captures in enthralling fashion the red-hot battle through the Finnish forests, with their huge ‘yumps’ and flat-out straights. Always a rally to set the pulses racing, Alen had the Lancia Delta running at its best and his ability to control the S4 at seemingly impossible speeds and angles will amaze the viewer. Supporting him would be...

programme.title: Race Rewind: Mexico City's road-course rumble
programme.desc: Relive the 2025 Viva Mexico 250 at Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in Mexico City, where the road-course aces showed off.

programme.title: Michael Schumacher at Le Mans
programme.desc: In 1991, before his stellar F1 career, Michael Schumacher raced for Mercedes at Le Mans - and had a legitimate shot at winning the most prestigious endurance race in the World. Autosport Editor-in-Chief Kevin Turner narrates the story of this dramatic race, and explains how the lessons Schumacher learnt in these 900bhp cars shaped his career in F1, and assisted him in some of his most famous races.

programme.title: Leclerc Looks Back at Highlights from his F1 Career
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc has had some huge moments in his career, from spectacular wins to helping the team develop even before he raced for Ferrari's F1 team. We sat down with Leclerc and brought him 5 photos from his career, asking him to pinpoint where he was and why each photo is so special to him.

programme.title: It's Time To Get Excited About Hydrogen Powered Race Cars
programme.desc: Hydrogen power is developing at a breakneck speed, and for Motorsport development, AVL is leading the charge. We visited AVL's headquarters in Graz, Austria, to find out just how they're developing a Hydrogen powered race car, and how it compares to the real thing in their state-of-the-art simulator. Thanks to AVL for providing access to their HQ and for sponsoring this video!

programme.title: When broken Porsches staggered to Le Mans victory
programme.desc: With 9 Porsche 956s finishing in the top 10, the 1983 24 Hours of Le Mans was a truly remarkable feat for Porsche. But just exactly how did they win? In this episode of “Short View Back to the Past”, Autosport Chief Editor Kevin Turner recalls the time that a very broken Porsche 956 won Le Mans.

programme.title: What REALLY Happened when F1 Drivers Went On Strike
programme.desc: Being a Formula 1 driver is one of those dream jobs, but that doesn’t mean everything always runs smoothly. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when the F1 drivers went on strike.

programme.title: How Do F1 Teams Test & Develop Components?
programme.desc: Putting components through their paces to maximise reliability and performance! Mike Elliott, Technology Director, talks us through what happens in the Test & Development department!

programme.title: Giorgio Piola's incredible career in motorsport
programme.desc: For the last 40 years, Giorgio has profiled every change in design and engineering for every car on the grid. Here we take a look at his incredible career.

programme.title: ELMS 2024: Season review
programme.desc: Check out highlights from the 2024 European Le Mans Series.

programme.desc: All of the action from the Macau Grand Prix in 1989, part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Round 1: Rosario - Race 1
programme.desc: Watch the first race of the first round of the 2025 TCR South America season in Rosario, Argentina.

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 1: Rally Van Haspengouw
programme.desc: The 27th edition of the event, the opening round of the Kroon-Oil Belgian Rally Championship, saw three drivers over 50 years old, claim the podium. Jos Verstappen dominated the race, with Frederic Miclotte and Pieter Tsjoen joining him on the podium.

programme.title: Spa Classic 2024
programme.desc: Catch up on all the highlights from the 2024 Spa Classic.

programme.title: Volkswagen ID.R: Nordschleife Record
programme.desc: Go on a journey with Volkswagen as they aim to break the lap record on the Nordschleife circuit, go behind the scenes with interviews from Hans-Joachim Stuck and Romain Dumas

programme.title: Why the 'second' Niki Lauda was even better than the first
programme.desc: As the Formula 1 paddock sets up in Monaco, the late Niki Lauda is not far from anyone's thoughts following his death earlier this week. Inside the paddock, Edd Straw is joined by Giorgio Piola, who knew Lauda throughout his F1 career, to get a very personal account of what it was like to know the three-time world champion. Piola explains what made Lauda tick, and how his accident in 1976 changed him into a new person who was "even more wonderful than the first".

programme.title: 9 interesting F1 tests that didn’t lead to anything
programme.desc: Formula 1 testing has thrown up some interesting car and driver combinations over the years, and as this list shows, plenty of top-name drivers have turned up in unexpected places. But sometimes a test deal catches the eye then doesn’t lead to a more permanent arrangement, for a wide variety of reasons. Here we take a look at nine particularly high-profile drivers who had a brief try-out with a team, but didn’t end up signing a proper deal

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: The history of driver bans in Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 drivers very rarely get banned from races - in fact, just five times in the history of the world championship has a driver sat out a race due to an official FIA sanction. But, unsurprisingly, F1's history of bans is a bit more complicated than that, so in this video we also look at the other drivers who have served what could be termed as 'unofficial' bans over the course of F1 history.

programme.title: 71st Macau GP: FR Macau Grand Prix - FIA FR World Cup - Race
programme.desc: Watch the livestream of the 71st Macau Grand Prix FR Macau Grand Prix 15 lap race as it happens.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: The Pioneer - MTB Stage Race (NZL)
programme.desc: After one edition, The Pioneer is already recognized as one of the world’s leading mountain bike stage races. Taking participants over the Alps on a stunning seven day journey that sees riders compete in pairs over 549km with 15,824m of climbing.ent.

programme.title: Int. Golden Roof Challenge 2017 - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: The Golden Fly Series has entered its fourth year! Following the successful 2016 season with appearances at Rio de Janeiro (BRA), Innsbruck (AUT), and Schaan (LIE), the series will return to Tirol’s capital Innsbruck on June 2, 2017.

programme.title: Dusi Canoe Marathon 2017 - Part 1 (RSA)
programme.desc: Today we are at the Dusi Canoe Marathon in South Africa. The race is unique in that it includes numerous portages were the paddlers carry their crafts over hills either to avoid unrunnable rapids and cataracts or eliminate long loops in the river.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023
programme.desc: Die ITF Beach Tennis World Tour Sand Series Classics 2023 startet am 18. und 19. März mit ihrer ersten Station in Réunion (FRA). Beachtennis ist eine schnell wachsende Sportart und eine Kombination aus Tennis, Beachvolleyball und Badminton.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of WOMEN
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das wichtigste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen der Welt. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt durch 648 ungezähmte Kilometer unberührter Landschaften und 15 475 Höhenmeter.

programme.title: Gritty in Mexico City - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: Urbanes MTB-Abenteuer mit Hans Rey & Rob Warner - Düster in Mexiko-StadtRob Warner erkundet zusammen mit Hans Rey Mexiko-Stadt auf dem E-Bike und durchquert die Mega-Metropole in 5 Tagen auf höchstem Niveau.

programme.title: GKA Magazine #1 Freestyle-Kite World Cup
programme.desc: Der Qatar Airways GKA startet in seine neue Saison 2023 mit dem Auftakt in Fuwairit, Katar und dem zweiten Stopp in Salinas Del Rey, Kolumbien. Wir werden einige spektakuläre Wasser-Action mit spektakulären Tricks und unglaublichen Flugzeiten sehen.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court
programme.desc: For the fourth year running Hamburg will host a Queen & King of the Court tournament. From May 30 till June 2nd the best of the best will travel once again to the harbor city on the Elbe River to fight for the titles of Queens and Kings of Hamburg.

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2024
programme.desc: At the end of June, the 29th annual of the legendary Mystic sk8 Cup took place in Prague – Štvanice island. In these historical records, you can see that the 30th anniversary is approaching, but already now, there was a lot to see and it was an incredible spectacle.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: 4Islands MTB Croatia
programme.desc: Das 4Islands MTB Croatia begrüßte über 400 Mountainbiker aus aller Welt zu einem fünftägigen Rennen auf vier kroatischen Inseln. Das Rennen führt über 291 km mit 6150 Höhenmetern und ist einzigartig, da die Fahrer auf dem Deck eines schwimmenden Bootes starten.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #01
programme.desc: Vodafone Queen & King of the Court wird seine Crown Series 2023 in Miami Beach, Florida, USA, starten. Die größten Stars des Beach-Volleyballs werden vom 9. bis 12. März 2023 anwesend sein.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Morocco
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge entdecken wir die ungezähmte Landschaft und die wunderschöne Wüste von Marokko. Wir machen einen 6-tägigen Mountainbike-Trip durch die spektakulären Sanddünen und werden beim diesjährigen Titan Desert 2023 epische Bike-Action erleben.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria wird auch 2023 wieder die besten Beachtennis-Spieler der Welt mit der Sand Series ITF Beachtennis Gran Canaria empfangen. Der Strand von Las Canteras wird vom 9.-14. Mai den idealen Rahmen für eine Meisterschaft von internationalem Format bieten.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024
programme.desc: World’s biggest long-distance triathlon: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024July 7th, 2024The world’s best athletes will conquer the traditional triathlon distance of 3.8 km swimming, 180 km cycling and 42.2 km running through the district of Roth in Bavaria, Germany.

programme.title: LAAX Highline World Championships 2024
programme.desc: The LAAX Highline World Championships 2024 will take place from July 17th to 21st in Laax, Switzerland, at the legendary GALAAXY on the summit of Crap Sogn Gion (2252m). The competition consists of two disciplines: Freestyle and Speed Highline.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Climbing Special - Worldwide
programme.desc: Kashmir, the Moab Desert, the famous Matterhorn, icefalls in Norway and Patagonia. We look back on breathtaking adventures, incredible alpine records and never-before-imagined new ascents

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: GKA Magazine #2 Kite-Surf World Cup
programme.desc: Auf der kapverdischen Insel Sal gibt es eine der besten Wellen der Welt. Ponta Preta erfreut sich perfekter rechtsdrehender Wellen, die sich um die felsige Landzunge winden. Für die Qatar Airways GKA World Tour ist es der ideale Ort, um die Kitesurf-Saison 2023 zu eröffnen.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #02
programme.desc: Beachvolleyball der WeltklasseZum dritten Mal in Folge ist Hamburg Gastgeber eines Queen & King of the Court-Turniers. Vom 25. bis 28. Mai werden wieder die Besten der Besten in die Hafenstadt an der Elbe reisen, um die Titel der Königinnen und Könige zu erkämpfen.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2023 - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Golden Roof Challenge, Home of the Golden Fly Series, ist eine weltbekannte Stabhochsprung- und Weitsprungsveranstaltung. Sie wird am 7. Juni zum 19. Mal im Herzen von Innsbruck, Österreich, ausgetragen.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway

Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland

programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia

programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania

programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Chael Sonnen has trained with Team Quest, alongside fighters like Matt Lindland and Randy Couture. Tim Credeur has kept busy fighting on the US navy jiu-jitsu and judo teams, and making some cash in bullpen fights in Tijuana.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: MMA Veteran Nick Thompson goes up against the brute force of wrestling star Davion Peterson. Thompson has more pro fight experience than anyone on the first series, and will need all of it to hold his own against the relentless Peterson.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E209 Undercover Love S1 E209
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E209 Dholi Beats S1 E209
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E209 King of Hearts S1 E209
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E209 Second Chances S1 E209
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Jodha Akbar S3 E3
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E209 This is Fate S1 E209
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E210 Second Chances S1 E210
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Jodha Akbar S3 E4
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Behan Hogi Teri
programme.desc: In the city of Lucknow, Gattu, a jobless UPSC aspirant falls in love with Binny, a girl who lives in his neighbourhood but doesn't pay much attention to him because she finds him a coward. Gattu's desire to marry Binny puts him in a situation where he has to not just face off with a family of criminals who want to make Binny their daughter-in-law but also gather the courage to convince his parents and neighbours that all boys and girls living in the same neighbourhood are not brothers and sisters.

programme.title: Double Dhamaal
programme.desc: Four men - Aditya, Boman, Manav, and Deshbandhu - are broke after losing money to officer Kabir Nayak. Learning of Kabir's affair with Gulabo, they plan to blackmail him. Enlisting gangster-turned-Sadhu Bata Bhai, they fail and flee to Macau. There, they encounter Kabir, now a casino owner, and plot their revenge.

programme.title: Buddy jedzie na zachód
programme.desc: „Doktor” i Indianin Girolamo trafiają do wioski na Dzikim Zachodzie, gdzie są świadkami terroru ze strony gangu i skorumpowanego szeryfa, który odkrył złoto pod ziemią. Bohaterowie decydują się pomóc mieszkańcom w walce o sprawiedliwość i pozbycie się przestępców.

programme.title: Legenda o samotnym jeźdźcu
programme.desc: Młody Strażnik Teksasu John Reid jako jedyny przeżywa zasadzkę zorganizowaną przez przywódcę renegatów Bartholomew "Butcha" Cavendisha. Przeżyć pomaga mu stary przyjaciel z dzieciństwa Komancz Tonto. Kiedy John dojdzie do siebie i wyliże rany, poświęci życie walce z przestępczością. John Reid stanie się zamaskowanym bohaterem zachodu, Samotnym Jeźdźcem. Z pomocą Tonto dwójka bohaterów wyrusza na ratunek prezydentowi Ulyssesowi S. Grantowi, gdy Cavendish bierze go za zakładnika. Dowiadujemy się, że Cavendish był oficerem w armii Stanów Zjednoczonych, zanim stanął przed sądem wojennym i został niehonorowo zwolniony.

programme.title: Cjamango
